textEditor

Class Subject

  • java.lang.Object
    • textEditor.Subject
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    EditorEngine, History

    public class Subject
extends java.lang.Object
    A class present in the implementation ever since version 2. It has not been modified during the development of the third version.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected Subject() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void attach(Observer o)
      Attaches an observer to the subject's list of observers.
      void detach(Observer o)
      Removes the observer received as argument from the subject's list of observers.
      void notifyObservers()
      When a subject's state changes, this function will be called;

    • Method Detail

      • attach

        public void attach(Observer o)
        Attaches an observer to the subject's list of observers.
        Parameters:
        o - The observer that will be attached to the list.

      • detach

        public void detach(Observer o)
        Removes the observer received as argument from the subject's list of observers.
        Parameters:
        o - The observer that will be removed from the list.

      • notifyObservers

        public void notifyObservers()
        When a subject's state changes, this function will be called;
